I'll help fix the layout in `Header.astro`. The issue seems to be with the language toggle button layout. Let's update the desktop and mobile language toggle buttons:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Desktop Language Toggle -->
<div class="hidden items-center space-x-4 md:flex">
  <button
    @click="$store.language = $store.language === 'ko' ? 'en' : 'ko'"
    class="inline-flex items-center gap-2 rounded-md border px-3 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 transition-colors duration-200 hover:border-purple-600 hover:text-purple-600 focus:outline-none"
  >
    <!-- Korean Flag -->
    <span x-show="$store.language === 'ko'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
      <img src="/images/flags/us.svg" alt="English" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
    </span>
    <!-- US Flag -->
    <span x-show="$store.language === 'en'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
      <img src="/images/flags/kr.svg" alt="Korean" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
    </span>
    <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? 'English' : '한국어'"></span>
  </button>
  
  <a
    href="/contact"
    class="rounded-lg bg-purple-600 px-4 py-2 text-center text-sm font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-4 focus:ring-purple-300"
  >
    <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 문의' : 'Contact Us'"></span>
  </a>
</div>

<!-- In the mobile menu section, update the language toggle button -->
<div class="mt-6 space-y-4 border-t border-gray-200 pt-6">
  <button
    @click="$store.language = $store.language === 'ko' ? 'en' : 'ko'"
    class="flex w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-purple-600"
  >
    <!-- Korean Flag -->
    <span x-show="$store.language === 'ko'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
      <img src="/images/flags/us.svg" alt="English" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
    </span>
    <!-- US Flag -->
    <span x-show="$store.language === 'en'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
      <img src="/images/flags/kr.svg" alt="Korean" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
    </span>
    <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? 'Switch to English' : '한국어로 전환'"></span>
  </button>

  <a
    href="/contact"
    class="block w-full rounded-lg bg-purple-600 px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700"
  >
    <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 문의' : 'Contact Us'"></span>
  </a>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. SVG 국기를 이미지로 대체 (더 깔끔하고 관리하기 쉬움)
2. 국기 이미지의 크기와 정렬 조정
3. 모바일 버전의 레이아웃 개선
4. 국기와 텍스트 사이의 간격 조정
5. 버튼 hover 효과 개선

이미지 파일을 추가하기 위해 다음 작업이 필요합니다:

1. `/public/images/flags/` 디렉토리를 생성
2. 해당 디렉토리에 `us.svg`와 `kr.svg` 파일을 추가

국기 이미지 파일을 생성하시겠습니까? 필요하시다면 국기 SVG 코드를 제공해드릴 수 있습니다.

_**Assistant**_

Let's fix the mobile menu by updating the visibility classes and menu structure in `Header.astro`. Here's the fix:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Update the navbar-sticky div to show on mobile -->
<div
  class="w-full items-center justify-between md:flex md:w-auto"
  :class="{ 'hidden': !mobileMenuOpen, 'block': mobileMenuOpen }"
  id="navbar-sticky"
>
  <ul
    class="mt-4 flex flex-col rounded-lg border border-gray-100 bg-gray-50 p-4 font-medium md:mt-0 md:flex-row md:space-x-8 md:border-0 md:bg-white md:p-0"
  >
    <!-- ... rest of the navigation items ... -->
  </ul>
</div>

<!-- Update the mobile menu div -->
<div
  x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
  x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
  x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 transform -translate-y-2"
  x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 transform translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
  x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 transform translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 transform -translate-y-2"
  class="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto bg-white md:hidden"
  style="display: none;"
  @click.away="mobileMenuOpen = false"
>
  <!-- ... rest of the mobile menu content ... -->
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. `navbar-sticky` div의 visibility를 Alpine.js의 `mobileMenuOpen` 상태에 따라 동적으로 변경
2. 모바일 메뉴에 기본적으로 `display: none` 스타일 추가
3. `:class` 디렉티브를 사용하여 모바일 메뉴 토글 구현

이렇게 하면:
1. 모바일에서 메뉴 버튼 클릭시 메뉴가 제대로 표시됨
2. 데스크톱에서는 기존대로 작동
3. 메뉴 외부 클릭시 메뉴가 닫힘
4. 부드러운 애니메이션 효과 유지

_**Assistant**_

Let me help fix the mobile menu and the errors. The issues seem to be related to Alpine.js initialization and event listeners. Let's update the `Header.astro` file:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- The top-level x-data here provides Alpine context -->
<div 
  x-data="{ 
    mobileMenuOpen: false,
    toggleMobileMenu() {
      this.mobileMenuOpen = !this.mobileMenuOpen;
      if (this.mobileMenuOpen) {
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
      } else {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
      }
    }
  }" 
  class="relative"
>
  <nav class="fixed start-0 top-0 z-20 w-full border-b border-gray-200 bg-white backdrop-blur-sm">
    <div class="mx-auto flex max-w-screen-xl flex-col px-4 py-4 md:flex-row md:items-center md:justify-between">
      <div class="flex w-full items-center justify-between md:w-auto">
        <a href="/" class="flex items-center">
          <img src="/images/bageledu/BagelEducation6.png" alt="BagelEdu" class="h-8 w-auto" />
        </a>
        <!-- Update mobile menu button -->
        <button
          type="button"
          class="inline-flex h-10 w-10 items-center justify-center rounded-lg p-2 text-sm text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-gray-200 md:hidden"
          @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
          aria-controls="mobile-menu"
          :aria-expanded="mobileMenuOpen"
        >
          <span class="sr-only" x-text="mobileMenuOpen ? 'Close menu' : 'Open menu'"></span>
          <HamburgerMenuIcon className="h-5 w-5" x-show="!mobileMenuOpen" />
          <Cross2Icon className="h-5 w-5" x-show="mobileMenuOpen" />
        </button>
      </div>

      <!-- Desktop Navigation -->
      <div class="hidden w-full items-center justify-between md:flex md:w-auto">
        <!-- ... rest of desktop navigation ... -->
      </div>

      <!-- Desktop Language and Contact -->
      <div class="hidden items-center space-x-4 md:flex">
        <!-- ... desktop language toggle and contact button ... -->
      </div>
    </div>
  </nav>

  <!-- Mobile Menu (Slide Over) -->
  <div
    x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
    x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
    x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 transform -translate-y-2"
    x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 transform translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
    x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 transform translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 transform -translate-y-2"
    class="fixed inset-0 z-50 overflow-y-auto bg-white md:hidden"
    style="display: none;"
    @click.away="toggleMobileMenu()"
    id="mobile-menu"
  >
    <!-- Mobile Menu Content -->
    <div class="relative min-h-screen">
      <div class="px-4 pb-6 pt-5">
        <!-- Mobile Header -->
        <div class="flex items-center justify-between">
          <div>
            <img src="/images/bageledu/bageledu-mobile-logo.png" alt="BagelEdu" class="h-8 w-auto" />
          </div>
          <button
            type="button"
            class="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md p-2 text-gray-400 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-500"
            @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
          >
            <span class="sr-only">Close menu</span>
            <Cross2Icon className="h-6 w-6" />
          </button>
        </div>

        <!-- Mobile Navigation -->
        <div class="mt-6">
          <nav class="grid gap-y-4">
            {
              navigation.map((link) => (
                <div>
                  {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ||
                  link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
                    <div x-data="{ open: false }">
                      <button
                        class="flex w-full items-center justify-between text-base font-medium text-gray-900"
                        @click="open = !open"
                      >
                        <span
                          data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                          data-label-en={link.label.en}
                          x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                        />
                        <ChevronDownIcon className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" />
                      </button>
                      <div
                        x-show="open"
                        x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-100"
                        x-transition:enter-start="transform opacity-0 scale-95"
                        x-transition:enter-end="transform opacity-100 scale-100"
                        x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-75"
                        x-transition:leave-start="transform opacity-100 scale-100"
                        x-transition:leave-end="transform opacity-0 scale-95"
                        class="mt-2 space-y-2"
                        style="display: none;"
                      >
                        <!-- ... rest of dropdown content ... -->
                      </div>
                    </div>
                  ) : (
                    <a
                      href={link.href}
                      class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
                      @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                      data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                      data-label-en={link.label.en}
                      x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                    />
                  )}
                </div>
              ))
            }
          </nav>
        </div>

        <!-- Mobile Language and Contact -->
        <div class="mt-6 space-y-4 border-t border-gray-200 pt-6">
          <!-- ... mobile language toggle and contact button ... -->
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. `x-data`에 `toggleMobileMenu` 함수 추가하여 메뉴 토글 및 body 스크롤 관리
2. 모바일 메뉴 버튼의 `@click` 이벤트를 `toggleMobileMenu()` 함수로 변경
3. 모든 `x-show` 디렉티브에 `style="display: none;"` 추가하여 초기 상태 설정
4. 모바일 메뉴 링크 클릭시 메뉴가 닫히도록 `@click="toggleMobileMenu()"` 추가
5. 불필요한 이벤트 리스너 제거 (share-modal.js 관련 에러 해결)
6. 드롭다운 메뉴의 transition 효과 개선

이렇게 하면:
1. 모바일 메뉴가 제대로 열리고 닫힘
2. 메뉴 열린 상태에서 스크롤이 방지됨
3. 메뉴 항목 클릭시 자동으로 메뉴가 닫힘
4. Alpine.js 관련 에러가 해결됨

_**Assistant**_

Let's fix the Alpine.js transition errors by simplifying the mobile menu implementation. Here's the updated version:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Update the top-level x-data -->
<div 
  x-data="{ 
    mobileMenuOpen: false,
    toggleMobileMenu() {
      this.mobileMenuOpen = !this.mobileMenuOpen;
      document.body.style.overflow = this.mobileMenuOpen ? 'hidden' : '';
    }
  }" 
  class="relative"
>
  <!-- Keep the nav and logo section the same -->

  <!-- Replace the mobile menu implementation with this simplified version -->
  <div
    x-cloak
    x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
    x-transition.opacity.duration.200ms
    class="fixed inset-0 z-40 bg-black bg-opacity-25"
    @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
  ></div>

  <div
    x-cloak
    x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
    x-transition:enter="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
    x-transition:enter-start="-translate-y-full"
    x-transition:enter-end="translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
    x-transition:leave-start="translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave-end="-translate-y-full"
    class="fixed inset-x-0 top-0 z-50 bg-white pt-14 md:hidden"
  >
    <div class="h-screen overflow-y-auto">
      <div class="space-y-6 px-4 pb-6 pt-5">
        <!-- Mobile Navigation -->
        <nav class="grid gap-y-4">
          {
            navigation.map((link) => (
              <div>
                {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ||
                link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
                  <div x-data="{ open: false }">
                    <button
                      class="flex w-full items-center justify-between text-base font-medium text-gray-900"
                      @click="open = !open"
                    >
                      <span
                        data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                        data-label-en={link.label.en}
                        x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                      />
                      <ChevronDownIcon 
                        className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" 
                        :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" 
                      />
                    </button>
                    <div
                      x-show="open"
                      x-collapse
                      class="mt-2 space-y-2"
                    >
                      {(link.label.en === 'Our Services'
                        ? programs
                        : admissionGuide
                      ).map((item) =>
                        link.label.en === 'Our Services' ? (
                          <a
                            href={`/programs/${item.slug}`}
                            class="block rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 text-base text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900"
                            @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                            data-label-ko={item.data.name.ko}
                            data-label-en={item.data.name.en}
                            x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                          />
                        ) : (
                          <a
                            href={`/admission-guide/${item.slug}`}
                            class="block rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 text-base text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900"
                            @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                            data-label-ko={item.data.name.ko}
                            data-label-en={item.data.name.en}
                            x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                          />
                        )
                      )}
                    </div>
                  </div>
                ) : (
                  <a
                    href={link.href}
                    class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
                    @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                    data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                    data-label-en={link.label.en}
                    x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                  />
                )}
              </div>
            ))
          }
        </nav>

        <!-- Mobile Language and Contact -->
        <div class="space-y-4 border-t border-gray-200 pt-6">
          <button
            @click="$store.language = $store.language === 'ko' ? 'en' : 'ko'"
            class="flex w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-purple-600"
          >
            <span x-show="$store.language === 'ko'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
              <img src="/images/flags/us.svg" alt="English" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
            </span>
            <span x-show="$store.language === 'en'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
              <img src="/images/flags/kr.svg" alt="Korean" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
            </span>
            <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? 'Switch to English' : '한국어로 전환'" />
          </button>

          <a
            href="/contact"
            @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
            class="block w-full rounded-lg bg-purple-600 px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700"
          >
            <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 문의' : 'Contact Us'" />
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
  [x-cloak] { display: none !important; }
  .backdrop-blur-sm {
    backdrop-filter: blur(8px);
  }
</style>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. `x-cloak` 디렉티브 추가하여 초기 로딩시 깜빡임 방지
2. 모바일 메뉴를 슬라이드 다운 애니메이션으로 변경
3. 백드롭 오버레이 추가
4. `x-collapse` 디렉티브를 사용하여 서브메뉴 애니메이션 개선
5. 모든 링크에 `@click="toggleMobileMenu()"` 추가하여 메뉴 자동 닫기
6. 불필요한 중첩된 transition 제거

이렇게 하면:
1. 모바일 메뉴가 부드럽게 열리고 닫힘
2. Alpine.js transition 에러가 해결됨
3. 메뉴 항목 클릭시 자동으로 메뉴가 닫힘
4. 성능이 개선됨

---

_**User**_

its working but missing logo can close button

---

_**Assistant**_

Let's add the logo and close button to the mobile menu. Here's the updated mobile menu section:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Replace the mobile menu section with this updated version -->
<div
  x-cloak
  x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
  x-transition.opacity.duration.200ms
  class="fixed inset-0 z-40 bg-black bg-opacity-25"
  @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
></div>

<div
  x-cloak
  x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
  x-transition:enter="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
  x-transition:enter-start="-translate-y-full"
  x-transition:enter-end="translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
  x-transition:leave-start="translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave-end="-translate-y-full"
  class="fixed inset-x-0 top-0 z-50 h-screen overflow-y-auto bg-white"
>
  <!-- Mobile Menu Header -->
  <div class="flex items-center justify-between border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-4">
    <div>
      <img
        src="/images/bageledu/BagelEducation6.png"
        alt="BagelEdu"
        class="h-8 w-auto"
      />
    </div>
    <button
      type="button"
      class="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md p-2 text-gray-400 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-500"
      @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
    >
      <span class="sr-only">Close menu</span>
      <Cross2Icon className="h-6 w-6" />
    </button>
  </div>

  <!-- Mobile Menu Content -->
  <div class="space-y-6 px-4 py-6">
    <!-- Mobile Navigation -->
    <nav class="grid gap-y-8">
      {
        navigation.map((link) => (
          <div>
            {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ||
            link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
              <div x-data="{ open: false }">
                <button
                  class="flex w-full items-center justify-between text-base font-medium text-gray-900"
                  @click="open = !open"
                >
                  <span
                    data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                    data-label-en={link.label.en}
                    x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                  />
                  <ChevronDownIcon 
                    className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" 
                    :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" 
                  />
                </button>
                <div
                  x-show="open"
                  x-collapse
                  class="mt-2 space-y-2"
                >
                  {(link.label.en === 'Our Services'
                    ? programs
                    : admissionGuide
                  ).map((item) =>
                    link.label.en === 'Our Services' ? (
                      <a
                        href={`/programs/${item.slug}`}
                        class="block rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 text-base text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900"
                        @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                        data-label-ko={item.data.name.ko}
                        data-label-en={item.data.name.en}
                        x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                      />
                    ) : (
                      <a
                        href={`/admission-guide/${item.slug}`}
                        class="block rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 text-base text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900"
                        @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                        data-label-ko={item.data.name.ko}
                        data-label-en={item.data.name.en}
                        x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                      />
                    )
                  )}
                </div>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <a
                href={link.href}
                class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
                @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                data-label-en={link.label.en}
                x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
              />
            )}
          </div>
        ))
      }
    </nav>

    <!-- Mobile Language and Contact -->
    <div class="space-y-4 border-t border-gray-200 pt-6">
      <button
        @click="$store.language = $store.language === 'ko' ? 'en' : 'ko'"
        class="flex w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-purple-600"
      >
        <span x-show="$store.language === 'ko'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
          <img src="/images/flags/us.svg" alt="English" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
        </span>
        <span x-show="$store.language === 'en'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
          <img src="/images/flags/kr.svg" alt="Korean" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
        </span>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? 'Switch to English' : '한국어로 전환'" />
      </button>

      <a
        href="/contact"
        @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
        class="block w-full rounded-lg bg-purple-600 px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700"
      >
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 문의' : 'Contact Us'" />
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. 모바일 메뉴 상단에 로고와 닫기 버튼이 있는 헤더 추가
2. 헤더에 border-b 추가하여 시각적 구분
3. 메뉴 아이템 간격 조정 (gap-y-8)
4. 전체 높이를 h-screen으로 설정하여 전체 화면 커버
5. 스크롤이 필요한 경우를 위해 overflow-y-auto 추가

이렇게 하면:
1. 모바일 메뉴 상단에 로고가 표시됨
2. 닫기 버튼이 우측 상단에 위치
3. 메뉴 아이템들이 더 잘 구분됨
4. 전체적인 디자인이 더 깔끔해짐

---

_**User**_

ok, there is a bug, on desktop when I click any nav menu, it flashing with mobile menu 

---

_**Assistant**_

Let's fix the flashing mobile menu issue by separating the desktop and mobile navigation logic more clearly. Here's the fix:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Update the navigation section -->
<div class="w-full items-center justify-between hidden md:flex md:w-auto">
  <!-- Desktop Navigation -->
  <ul class="flex flex-row space-x-8 font-medium">
    {
      navigation.map((link) => (
        <li class="flex items-center">
          {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ? (
            <div class="group relative" x-data="{ open: false }">
              <button
                class="group flex items-center rounded px-3 py-2 text-gray-900 hover:bg-transparent"
                @click="open = !open"
                @click.away="open = false"
              >
                <!-- ... rest of the button content ... -->
              </button>
              <div
                x-show="open"
                x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
                x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
                x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
                x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
                x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
                x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
                class="absolute left-1/2 mt-2 w-screen max-w-[60rem] -translate-x-1/2 transform rounded-xl border border-gray-100 bg-white shadow-lg"
                @click.away="open = false"
              >
                <!-- ... rest of the dropdown content ... -->
              </div>
            </div>
          ) : link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
            <!-- ... Admission Guide dropdown ... -->
          ) : (
            <a
              href={link.href}
              class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
              data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
              data-label-en={link.label.en}
              x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
            />
          )}
        </li>
      ))
    }
  </ul>
</div>

<!-- Mobile Navigation (Only visible on mobile) -->
<div 
  class="w-full md:hidden" 
  :class="{ 'hidden': !mobileMenuOpen, 'block': mobileMenuOpen }"
>
  <ul class="mt-4 flex flex-col rounded-lg border border-gray-100 bg-gray-50 p-4 font-medium">
    <!-- ... mobile navigation content ... -->
  </ul>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. 데스크톱 네비게이션에 `hidden md:flex` 클래스 추가
2. 모바일 네비게이션에 `md:hidden` 클래스 추가
3. 데스크톱 메뉴에서 불필요한 모바일 관련 클래스 제거
4. 모바일/데스크톱 네비게이션을 완전히 분리

이렇게 하면:
1. 데스크톱에서 메뉴 클릭시 모바일 메뉴가 깜빡이지 않음
2. 모바일과 데스크톱 메뉴가 완전히 독립적으로 작동
3. 반응형 동작이 더 매끄러워짐

_**User**_

mega menu is not working on header

---

_**Assistant**_

Let's fix the mega menu issue in the header. The problem appears to be with the visibility of the dropdown menus. Here's the fix:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Update the Our Services dropdown section -->
<div class="group relative" x-data="{ open: false }">
  <button
    class="group flex items-center rounded px-3 py-2 text-gray-900 hover:bg-transparent"
    @click="open = !open"
    @click.away="open = false"
  >
    <span class="relative" x-data>
      <span
        data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
        data-label-en={link.label.en}
        x-text="$store.language === 'ko'
              ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko')
              : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
      />
      <span class="absolute -bottom-1 left-0 h-0.5 w-full origin-left scale-x-0 transform bg-purple-600 transition-transform group-hover:scale-x-100" />
    </span>
    <ChevronDownIcon className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" />
  </button>
  <div
    x-show="open"
    x-cloak
    style="display: none"
    x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
    x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
    x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    class="absolute left-1/2 mt-2 w-screen max-w-[60rem] -translate-x-1/2 transform rounded-xl border border-gray-100 bg-white shadow-lg"
    @click.away="open = false"
  >
    <!-- ... rest of the mega menu content ... -->
  </div>
</div>

<!-- Update the Admission Guide dropdown section similarly -->
<div class="group relative" x-data="{ open: false }">
  <button
    class="group flex items-center rounded px-3 py-2 text-gray-900 hover:bg-transparent"
    @click="open = !open"
    @click.away="open = false"
  >
    <!-- ... button content ... -->
  </button>
  <div
    x-show="open"
    x-cloak
    style="display: none"
    x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
    x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
    x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    class="absolute left-0 mt-2 w-screen max-w-[30rem] rounded-xl border border-gray-100 bg-white shadow-lg"
    @click.away="open = false"
  >
    <!-- ... rest of the admission guide menu content ... -->
  </div>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. `x-cloak` 디렉티브 추가
2. `style="display: none"` 초기 스타일 추가
3. `hidden` 클래스 제거 (md:block 포함)
4. 트랜지션 효과 유지
5. 클릭 이벤트 핸들링 유지

이렇게 하면:
1. 메가 메뉴가 초기에 보이지 않음
2. 클릭시 부드럽게 나타남
3. 모바일/데스크톱 모두에서 정상 작동
4. 트랜지션 효과가 자연스럽게 적용됨

_**User**_

mobile menu all gone, and mega menu is not working

---

_**Assistant**_

Let's fix both the mobile menu and mega menu issues. Here's the corrected version:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- First, fix the desktop navigation container -->
<div class="hidden w-full items-center justify-between md:flex md:w-auto">
  <!-- Desktop Navigation -->
  <ul class="flex flex-row space-x-8 font-medium">
    {
      navigation.map((link) => (
        <li class="flex items-center">
          {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ? (
            <div class="group relative" x-data="{ open: false }">
              <button
                class="group flex items-center rounded px-3 py-2 text-gray-900 hover:bg-transparent"
                @click="open = !open"
                @click.away="open = false"
              >
                <!-- ... button content ... -->
              </button>
              <div
                x-show="open"
                x-cloak
                style="display: none"
                x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
                x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
                x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
                x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
                x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
                x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
                class="absolute left-1/2 mt-2 w-screen max-w-[60rem] -translate-x-1/2 transform rounded-xl border border-gray-100 bg-white shadow-lg"
              >
                <!-- ... mega menu content ... -->
              </div>
            </div>
          ) : link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
            <!-- ... similar structure for Admission Guide ... -->
          ) : (
            <a
              href={link.href}
              class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
              data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
              data-label-en={link.label.en}
              x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
            />
          )}
        </li>
      ))
    }
  </ul>
</div>

<!-- Remove the duplicate mobile menu and keep only the slide-in version -->
<div
  x-cloak
  x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
  x-transition.opacity.duration.200ms
  class="fixed inset-0 z-40 bg-black bg-opacity-25"
  @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
></div>

<div
  x-cloak
  x-show="mobileMenuOpen"
  x-transition:enter="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
  x-transition:enter-start="-translate-y-full"
  x-transition:enter-end="translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave="transform transition ease-in-out duration-300"
  x-transition:leave-start="translate-y-0"
  x-transition:leave-end="-translate-y-full"
  class="fixed inset-x-0 top-0 z-50 h-screen overflow-y-auto bg-white"
>
  <!-- Mobile Menu Header -->
  <div class="flex items-center justify-between border-b border-gray-200 px-4 py-4">
    <div>
      <img
        src="/images/bageledu/BagelEducation6.png"
        alt="BagelEdu"
        class="h-8 w-auto"
      />
    </div>
    <button
      type="button"
      class="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md p-2 text-gray-400 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-500"
      @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
    >
      <span class="sr-only">Close menu</span>
      <Cross2Icon className="h-6 w-6" />
    </button>
  </div>

  <!-- Mobile Menu Content -->
  <div class="space-y-6 px-4 py-6">
    <!-- Mobile Navigation -->
    <nav class="grid gap-y-8">
      {
        navigation.map((link) => (
          <div>
            {link.label.en === 'Our Services' ||
            link.label.en === 'Admission Guide' ? (
              <div x-data="{ open: false }">
                <button
                  class="flex w-full items-center justify-between text-base font-medium text-gray-900"
                  @click="open = !open"
                >
                  <span
                    data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                    data-label-en={link.label.en}
                    x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                  />
                  <ChevronDownIcon 
                    className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" 
                    :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" 
                  />
                </button>
                <div
                  x-show="open"
                  x-collapse
                  class="mt-2 space-y-2"
                >
                  {(link.label.en === 'Our Services'
                    ? programs
                    : admissionGuide
                  ).map((item) => (
                    <a
                      href={`/${link.label.en === 'Our Services' ? 'programs' : 'admission-guide'}/${item.slug}`}
                      class="block rounded-lg py-2 pl-4 text-base text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-900"
                      @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                      data-label-ko={item.data.name.ko}
                      data-label-en={item.data.name.en}
                      x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
                    />
                  ))}
                </div>
              </div>
            ) : (
              <a
                href={link.href}
                class="block text-base font-medium text-gray-900 hover:text-purple-600"
                @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
                data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
                data-label-en={link.label.en}
                x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
              />
            )}
          </div>
        ))
      }
    </nav>

    <!-- Mobile Language and Contact -->
    <div class="space-y-4 border-t border-gray-200 pt-6">
      <button
        @click="$store.language = $store.language === 'ko' ? 'en' : 'ko'"
        class="flex w-full items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-gray-700 hover:text-purple-600"
      >
        <span x-show="$store.language === 'ko'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
          <img src="/images/flags/us.svg" alt="English" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
        </span>
        <span x-show="$store.language === 'en'" class="flex h-5 w-5 items-center">
          <img src="/images/flags/kr.svg" alt="Korean" class="h-4 w-4 rounded-full" />
        </span>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? 'Switch to English' : '한국어로 전환'" />
      </button>

      <a
        href="/contact"
        @click="toggleMobileMenu()"
        class="block w-full rounded-lg bg-purple-600 px-4 py-2 text-center font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700"
      >
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 문의' : 'Contact Us'" />
      </a>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. 데스크톱 네비게이션 컨테이너의 `hidden` 클래스와 `md:flex` 클래스 수정
2. 중복된 모바일 메뉴 제거하고 슬라이드인 버전만 유지
3. 메가 메뉴의 `x-show`와 `x-cloak` 디렉티브 수정
4. 모바일 메뉴의 구조 개선 및 네비게이션 아이템 정리

이렇게 하면:
1. 데스크톱에서 메가 메뉴가 정상적으로 작동
2. 모바일 메뉴가 올바르게 표시되고 작동
3. 언어 전환과 메뉴 전환이 모든 화면 크기에서 정상 작동

---

_**User**_

ok mega menu our services is working but admission guide is not working

---

_**Assistant**_

The issue is with the Admission Guide dropdown menu. Let's fix it by making it consistent with the Our Services dropdown. Here's the fix:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Update the Admission Guide dropdown section -->
<div class="group relative" x-data="{ open: false }">
  <button
    class="group flex items-center rounded px-3 py-2 text-gray-900 hover:bg-transparent"
    @click="open = !open"
    @click.away="open = false"
  >
    <span class="relative" x-data>
      <span
        data-label-ko={link.label.ko}
        data-label-en={link.label.en}
        x-text="$store.language === 'ko'
              ? $el.getAttribute('data-label-ko')
              : $el.getAttribute('data-label-en')"
      />
      <span class="absolute -bottom-1 left-0 h-0.5 w-full origin-left scale-x-0 transform bg-purple-600 transition-transform group-hover:scale-x-100" />
    </span>
    <ChevronDownIcon className="w-4 h-4 ml-1 transition-transform duration-200" :class="{ 'rotate-180': open }" />
  </button>
  <div
    x-show="open"
    x-cloak
    style="display: none"
    x-transition:enter="transition ease-out duration-200"
    x-transition:enter-start="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    x-transition:enter-end="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave="transition ease-in duration-150"
    x-transition:leave-start="opacity-100 translate-y-0"
    x-transition:leave-end="opacity-0 translate-y-1"
    class="absolute left-1/2 mt-2 w-screen max-w-[30rem] -translate-x-1/2 transform rounded-xl border border-gray-100 bg-white shadow-lg"
  >
    <div class="p-6">
      <h3 class="mb-4 text-xs font-semibold uppercase tracking-wider text-gray-400">
        Admission Resources
      </h3>
      <div class="space-y-4">
        {admissionGuide.map((item) => (
          <a
            href={`/admission-guide/${item.slug}`}
            class:list={[
              'group block rounded-lg p-3 transition-all duration-200 hover:bg-purple-50',
              pathname === `/admission-guide/${item.slug}` &&
                'bg-purple-50',
            ]}
          >
            <p
              class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-900 transition-colors duration-200 group-hover:text-purple-600"
              data-name-ko={item.data.name.ko}
              data-name-en={item.data.name.en}
              x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-name-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-name-en')"
            />
            {item.data.dropdownDescription && (
              <p
                class="mt-1 text-sm text-gray-500"
                data-desc-ko={item.data.dropdownDescription.ko}
                data-desc-en={item.data.dropdownDescription.en}
                x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? $el.getAttribute('data-desc-ko') : $el.getAttribute('data-desc-en')"
              />
            )}
          </a>
        ))}
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
```

주요 변경사항:
1. `left-0`를 `left-1/2`로 변경하고 `-translate-x-1/2` 추가하여 중앙 정렬
2. `@click.away="open = false"` 위치 수정
3. `style="display: none"` 추가
4. 트랜지션 효과 유지

이렇게 하면:
1. Admission Guide 드롭다운 메뉴가 Our Services와 동일한 방식으로 작동
2. 메뉴가 버튼 중앙에 정렬
3. 클릭시 부드럽게 나타나고 사라짐
4. 메뉴 외부 클릭시 닫힘

---

_**User**_

there is invalid date why?

---

_**Assistant**_

The "Invalid Date" issue appears in the blog posts section because the date format in the data might not be in a valid format that JavaScript's Date object can parse. Let's fix this by ensuring proper date formatting.

First, let's check how the date is being displayed in the mega menu:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<!-- Find and update this section in the Latest Updates area -->
<p
  class="mt-2 text-xs text-gray-400"
  x-data
  x-text="new Date('${post.data.date}').toLocaleDateString($store.language === 'ko' ? 'ko-KR' : 'en-US', { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' })"
/>
```

Let's modify it to handle the date more safely:

```astro:src/components/shared/Header.astro
<p
  class="mt-2 text-xs text-gray-400"
  x-data="{ 
    formatDate(dateStr) {
      try {
        const date = new Date(dateStr);
        if (isNaN(date.getTime())) return '';
        return date.toLocaleDateString($store.language === 'ko' ? 'ko-KR' : 'en-US', 
          { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }
        );
      } catch (e) {
        return '';
      }
    }
  }"
  x-text="formatDate('${post.data.date}')"
/>
```

Also, we need to make sure the date format in your blog posts is correct. The date in your content files should be in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD). For example:

```yaml
---
title:
  en: "Blog Post Title"
  ko: "블로그 포스트 제목"
date: "2024-02-20"  # Use this format
---
```

To fix this:

1. Check your blog post files in `src/content/blog/` directory
2. Make sure all dates are in YYYY-MM-DD format
3. If you need to keep track of time as well, use YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.sssZ format

For example:
```yaml
date: "2024-02-20"           # Just date
# or
date: "2024-02-20T12:00:00Z" # Date with time
```

This should resolve the "Invalid Date" issue in your mega menu.

---



---

import { Image } from 'astro:assets'

import image1 from '@images/bageledu/bagelEdu-2.jpeg'
import image2 from '@images/stock/school-grid-02.jpg'
import image3 from '@images/stock/school-grid-03.jpg'
import image4 from '@images/bageledu/bagelEdu-3.jpeg'
import image5 from '@images/stock/school-grid-05.jpg'

const images = [
  { src: image1, alt: 'Meeting room with colleagues' },
  { src: image2, alt: 'Teacher portrait' },
  { src: image3, alt: 'Teacher reading to students' },
  { src: image4, alt: 'Child writing on board with teacher' },
  { src: image5, alt: 'Classroom' },
]

const content = {
  en: {
    title: "Why BagelEdu",
    subtitle: "To improve English skills, you need to engage in conversations with smart and sharp mentors on good topics, understand them, and work on correcting mistakes.",
    paragraph1: "Students at prestigious British and American universities are trained to logically persuade and structure their thoughts in any situation through intense discussions and persuasion with professors and peers. These tutors from top universities and Ivy League schools share their thoughts directly in English and teach how to create sophisticated expressions and logical sentences that are actually used.",
    paragraph2: "While many native speakers can help with English learning, we emphasize the importance of mentors who can go beyond everyday conversation to engage in business case analysis and in-depth discussions. Furthermore, beyond simple quantitative achievements in curricular and extracurricular activities, we provide customized career planning tailored to students' career aspirations, tendencies, and characteristics. Through this, we help students grow beyond being simply 'well-rounded' to become 'spiked' talents most preferred by universities."
  },
  ko: {
    title: "Why BagelEdu",
    subtitle: "영어 실력을 키우려면, 똑똑하고 예리한 멘토와 좋은 주제로 대화하고, 이해하고 틀린 부분을 고쳐 나가야 합니다.",
    paragraph1: "영∙미 명문대 학생들은 교수와 동료와의 치열한 토론과 설득의 환경 속에서 어떤 상황에서도 논리적으로 설득하고 생각을 구조화할 수 있는 능력을 훈련받습니다. 이러한 명문대 및 아이비리그 출신 튜터들은 영어로 직접 사고를 나누며, 실제로 쓰이는 고급 표현과 논리적인 문장을 만드는 방법을 가르칩니다.",
    paragraph2: "많은 원어민이 영어 학습을 도울 수 있지만, 우리는 단순히 일상 대화를 넘어 비즈니스 사례 분석과 깊이 있는 토론까지 함께할 수 있는 멘토의 중요성을 강조합니다. 또한, 교과 및 비교과 활동의 단순한 양적 성취를 넘어, 학생의 진로 희망과 성향, 특성에 맞춘 맞춤형 진로 설계를 제공합니다. 이를 통해 단순히 '균형 잡힌(well-rounded)' 학생을 넘어, 대학에서 가장 선호하는 '특화된(spiked)' 인재로 성장할 수 있도록 돕습니다."
  }
}

<section class="bg-purple-25 px-4 pt-16 sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
  <!-- Container -->
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-xl">
    <!-- Page header -->
    <div class="relative">
      <h2 class="h1 mx-auto max-w-3xl text-center text-purple-900 pt-24" x-data={`{ content: ${JSON.stringify(content)} }`}>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? content.ko.title : content.en.title"></span>
      </h2>
      <p class="mx-auto mt-4 max-w-2xl text-center text-xl leading-relaxed text-purple-800 sm:mt-5" x-data={`{ content: ${JSON.stringify(content)} }`}>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? content.ko.subtitle : content.en.subtitle"></span>
      </p>
    </div>
    {/* School images grid */}
    <div class="mt-14 grid grid-flow-row-dense grid-cols-2 gap-2 sm:mt-16 sm:grid-cols-3 sm:gap-3 md:gap-4 lg:mt-24 lg:gap-6">
      {
        images.map((image, index) => (
          <>
            {index % 5 == 1 && (
              <Image
                class="col-span-2 h-30vw w-full rounded-2xl object-cover object-top lg:h-80"
                alt={image.alt}
                src={image.src}
              />
            )}

            {index % 5 != 1 && (
              <Image
                class="h-30vw w-full rounded-2xl object-cover lg:h-80"
                alt={image.alt}
                src={image.src}
              />
            )}
          </>
        ))
      }
    </div>
    {/* About school */}
    <div class="prose prose-lg mx-auto mt-14 sm:prose-xl sm:mt-16 lg:mt-24" x-data={`{ content: ${JSON.stringify(content)} }`}>
      <p>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? content.ko.paragraph1 : content.en.paragraph1"></span>
      </p>
      <p>
        <span x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? content.ko.paragraph2 : content.en.paragraph2"></span>
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<section class="overflow-hidden bg-white px-4 pb-28 sm:px-6 sm:pb-36 lg:px-8">
  {/* Container */}
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-xl">
    {/* Section header */}
    <div class="px-4 text-center sm:px-6 lg:px-8">
      <h3 class="h2 text-purple-900">
        <span class="block" x-data x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '학부모 및 학생들의 생생한 후기' : 'Parents and Students Reviews'"></span>
        {/* Underlined text */}
        <span class="relative block">
          <span class="relative">
            <Image
              class="absolute inset-0 translate-y-9 transform sm:translate-y-10 xl:translate-y-12"
              src={highlight}
              alt=""
            />
            <span class="relative" x-data x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '후기' : 'Reviews'"></span>
          </span>
        </span>
      </h3>
    </div>
    {/* Block 1 */}
    {
      blocks.map((block, index) => (
        <div class="mx-auto mt-20 grid max-w-xl gap-14 sm:mt-24 sm:gap-16 lg:mt-44 lg:max-w-none lg:grid-cols-12 lg:gap-8">
          {/* Block text content */}
          <div
            class:list={[
              'relative z-10 order-2 flex flex-col justify-center lg:col-span-6 lg:text-left',
              { 'lg:order-1': index % 2 == 0 },
            ]}
          >
            <div>
              <span class="inline-block -rotate-1 rounded-full bg-purple-200 px-4 py-2 font-medium text-purple-700 shadow-md" x-data={`{ block: ${JSON.stringify(block)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? block.tagline.ko : block.tagline.en">
              </span>
            </div>
            <div>
              <h3 class="h4 mt-3.5 font-bold text-purple-900" x-data={`{ block: ${JSON.stringify(block)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? block.headline.ko : block.headline.en">
              </h3>
              <p class="mt-3 max-w-xl text-lg text-purple-800 sm:text-xl sm:leading-relaxed" x-data={`{ block: ${JSON.stringify(block)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? block.text.ko : block.text.en">
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
          {/* Block graphics */}
          <div
            class:list={[
              'relative order-1 mx-auto w-full max-w-xl lg:col-span-6 lg:mx-0 lg:flex lg:max-w-none lg:items-center',
              { 'lg:order-2': index % 2 == 0 },
            ]}
          >
            {/* Blob background decoration on large screens */}
            <div class="hidden lg:block">
              <Image
                src={bgBlobs[index % 3]}
                class="absolute inset-0 h-full w-full transform lg:scale-135"
                alt=""
              />
            </div>
            {/* Grid background decoration on small screens */}
            <Image
              src={dotsStrip}
              class="absolute left-1/2 top-0 origin-top -translate-x-1/2 -translate-y-8 scale-80 transform sm:scale-100 lg:hidden"
              alt=""
            />
            <div
              class:list={[
                'relative mx-auto w-full rounded-3xl shadow-lg lg:max-w-lg',
                index % 2 == 0 ? 'lg:ml-auto lg:mr-0' : 'lg:mx-0',
              ]}
            >
              <div class="relative block w-full">
                {/* Corner dots decoration */}
                <Image
                  class:list={[
                    'absolute -top-20 z-10 hidden w-40 transform lg:block xl:-top-20 xl:w-48',
                    index % 2 == 0 ? '-left-20' : '-right-20',
                  ]}
                  src={dots}
                  alt=""
                />
                {/* Block image */}
                <figure class="relative aspect-[12/10] md:order-1">
                  <Image
                    src={block.image.src}
                    class="absolute inset-0 h-full w-full rounded-3xl object-cover object-center shadow-xl"
                    alt={block.image.alt}
                  />
                </figure>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      ))
    }
  </div>
</section>

      </h2>
      <p class="mx-auto mt-4 max-w-3xl text-center text-xl leading-relaxed text-purple-50">
        Our students have been accepted to these prestigious boarding schools
      </p>
    </div>

    {/* Schools Grid */}
    <div class="mt-12 grid grid-cols-1 gap-8 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3">
      {boardingSchools.map((school, index) => (
        <div class="relative overflow-hidden rounded-lg bg-white shadow-lg transition-transform hover:scale-105">
          <div class="aspect-w-16 aspect-h-9">
            <Image
              src={school.image}
              alt={school.name}
              class="h-full w-full object-cover"
            />
          </div>
          
          {/* Ranking Badge */}
          <div class="absolute left-4 top-4 flex h-12 w-12 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-purple-600 font-written text-2xl text-white">
            #{school.ranking}
          </div>

          <div class="p-6">
            <h3 class="text-xl font-bold text-gray-900">{school.name}</h3>
            <p class="text-gray-600">{school.location}</p>
            
            <div class="mt-4 flex justify-between text-sm">
              <div>
                <span class="font-semibold">Acceptance:</span> {school.acceptanceRate}
              </div>
              <div>
                <span class="font-semibold">SAT:</span> {school.avgSAT}
              </div>
            </div>

            <div class="mt-4 grid grid-cols-2 gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600">
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Founded:</span> {school.founded}</div>
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Students:</span> {school.enrollment}</div>
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Boarding:</span> {school.boardingPercent}</div>
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Student:Teacher:</span> {school.studentTeacherRatio}</div>
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Endowment:</span> {school.endowment}</div>
              <div><span class="font-semibold">Tuition:</span> {school.tuition}</div>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

  </div>
</div>

<Toaster client:load />

<script>
  import toast from 'react-hot-toast'
  import Alpine from 'alpinejs'

  const form = document.getElementById('contactForm')

  form?.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()

    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/contact', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: new FormData(e.target as HTMLFormElement),
      })

      const language = Alpine.store('language')

      if (res.ok) {
        toast.success(
          language === 'ko'
            ? '메시지가 성공적으로 전송되었습니다.'
            : 'Message sent successfully.',
        )
        ;(e.target as HTMLFormElement).reset()
      } else {
        toast.error(
          language === 'ko'
            ? '메시지 전송에 실패했습니다.'
            : 'Failed to send message.',
        )
      }
    } catch (err) {
      const language = Alpine.store('language')
      toast.error(
        language === 'ko'
          ? '오류가 발생했습니다. 다시 시도해주세요.'
          : 'An error occurred. Please try again.',
      )
      console.error(err)
    }
  })
</script>

                class="focus:ring-primary mt-2.5 block w-full rounded-md border-0 px-3.5 py-2 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset sm:text-sm sm:leading-6"
                required
              />
            </div>
            <div>
              <label
                for="program-name"
                class="block text-sm font-semibold leading-6 text-gray-900"
              >
                <span
                  x-data
                  x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '관심 프로그램 *' : 'Program of Interest *'"
                ></span>
              </label>
              <select
                id="program-name"
                name="program-name"
                class="focus:ring-primary mt-2.5 block w-full rounded-md border-0 px-3.5 py-2 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset sm:text-sm sm:leading-6"
                required
              >
                <option
                  value=""
                  x-data
                  x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '프로그램을 선택해주세요' : 'Please select a program'"
                ></option>
                <option value="Tutor Service Online/Offline"
                  >Tutor Service Online/Offline</option
                >
                <option value="Summer/Winter Camp">Summer/Winter Camp</option>
                <option value="Undergraduate Admissions Consulting"
                  >Undergraduate Admissions Consulting</option
                >
                <option value="MBA Admissions Consulting"
                  >MBA Admissions Consulting</option
                >
              </select>
            </div>
            <div>
              <label
                for="message"
                class="block text-sm font-semibold leading-6 text-gray-900"
              >
                <span
                  x-data
                  x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '문의사항 *' : 'Message *'"
                ></span>
              </label>
              <textarea
                name="message"
                id="message"
                rows="4"
                x-data
                x-bind:placeholder="$store.language === 'ko' ? '문의하실 내용을 입력해주세요...' : 'Please enter your message...'"
                class="focus:ring-primary mt-2.5 block w-full rounded-md border-0 px-3.5 py-2 text-gray-900 shadow-sm ring-1 ring-inset ring-gray-300 placeholder:text-gray-400 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-inset sm:text-sm sm:leading-6"
                required></textarea>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="mt-8 flex justify-end">
            <button
              type="submit"
              class="rounded-md bg-black px-6 py-3 text-sm font-semibold text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-gray-800 focus-visible:outline focus-visible:outline-2 focus-visible:outline-offset-2 focus-visible:outline-black"
            >
              <span
                x-data
                x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '문의하기' : 'Submit'"
              ></span>
            </button>
          </div>
        </div>
      </form>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<Toaster client:load />

<script>
  import toast from 'react-hot-toast'
  import Alpine from 'alpinejs'

  const form = document.getElementById('contactForm')

  form?.addEventListener('submit', async (e) => {
    e.preventDefault()

    try {
      const res = await fetch('/api/contact', {
        method: 'POST',
        body: new FormData(e.target as HTMLFormElement),
      })

      const language = Alpine.store('language')

      if (res.ok) {
        toast.success(
          language === 'ko'
            ? '메시지가 성공적으로 전송되었습니다.'
            : 'Message sent successfully.',
        )
        ;(e.target as HTMLFormElement).reset()
      } else {
        toast.error(
          language === 'ko'
            ? '메시지 전송에 실패했습니다.'
            : 'Failed to send message.',
        )
      }
    } catch (err) {
      const language = Alpine.store('language')
      toast.error(
        language === 'ko'
          ? '오류가 발생했습니다. 다시 시도해주세요.'
          : 'An error occurred. Please try again.',
      )
      console.error(err)
    }
  })
</script>

File: src/components/contact/SelectBox.astro

import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'astro/types'

interface CustomProps {
  label?: string
  name: string
  description?: string
  elementType?: 'input' | 'textarea'
  rows?: number
}

type Props = CustomProps & HTMLAttributes<'input'> & HTMLAttributes<'textarea'>

const {
  label,
  name,
  description,
  rows = 5,
  elementType = 'input',
  class: className,
  ...attrs
} = Astro.props

const baseClasses =
  'mt-2 w-full rounded-2xl border-2 border-purple-50 p-4 text-sm font-medium text-purple-700 placeholder-purple-700 placeholder-opacity-70 outline-none duration-300 ease-in-out focus:border-purple-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-purple-200'
---

<div>
  <label for={name} class="ml-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-purple-900">
    {label}
  </label>
      <select
        id={name}
        name={name}
        class:list={[baseClasses, 'h-14', className]}
        {...attrs}
      >
    <option>Tutor Service Online/Offline</option>
    <option>Summer/Winter Camp</option>
    <option>Undergraduate Admissions Consulting</option>
    <option>MBA Admissions Consulting</option>
  </select>
</div>

================
File: src/components/contact/TextField.astro
================
---
import type { HTMLAttributes } from 'astro/types'

interface CustomProps {
  label?: string
  name: string
  description?: string
  elementType?: 'input' | 'textarea'
  rows?: number
}

type Props = CustomProps & HTMLAttributes<'input'> & HTMLAttributes<'textarea'>

const {
  label,
  name,
  description,
  rows = 5,
  elementType = 'input',
  class: className,
  ...attrs
} = Astro.props

const baseClasses =
  'mt-2 w-full rounded-2xl border-2 border-purple-50 p-4 text-sm font-medium text-purple-700 placeholder-purple-700 placeholder-opacity-70 outline-none duration-300 ease-in-out focus:border-purple-200 focus:outline-none focus:ring-purple-200'
---

<div>
  <label for={name} class="ml-0.5 text-sm font-medium text-purple-900">
    {label}
  </label>
  
  {
    elementType === 'textarea' ? (
      <textarea
        id={name}
        name={name}
        rows={rows}
        class:list={[baseClasses, className]}
        {...attrs}
      />
    ) : (
      <input
        id={name}
        name={name}
        class:list={[baseClasses, 'h-14', className]}
        {...attrs}
      />
    )
  }
</div>

import { Image } from 'astro:assets'

interface Props {

  currentCategory: string
  categories: { name: string; slug: string }[]
}

const { galleryEntries, currentCategory, categories } = Astro.props

<section id="gallery">
  <div class="bg-purple-25 px-4 pt-20 sm:px-6 sm:pt-28 lg:px-8 lg:pt-36">
    <div class="mx-auto max-w-screen-xl">
      <h3
        class="h2 mx-auto mb-10 max-w-2xl text-center text-purple-900 sm:mb-12 md:mb-20"
      >
        See what it's like to be part of our school
      </h3>
      <ul
        class="-my-2 flex flex-wrap items-center justify-center space-x-2 text-sm font-medium sm:space-x-4 lg:space-x-6"
      >
        <li class="my-2">
          <a
            class:list={[
              'inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-4 py-1.5 duration-300 ease-in-out sm:text-lg',
              currentCategory === 'all'
                ? 'bg-purple-600 text-purple-25 hover:bg-purple-500'
                : 'bg-white text-purple-700 shadow-sm hover:bg-purple-100',
            ]}
            href="/gallery#gallery"
          >
            All images
          </a>
        </li>
        {
          categories.map((category) => (
            <li class="my-2">
              <a
                class:list={[
                  'inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-full px-4 py-1.5 duration-300 ease-in-out sm:text-lg',
                  category.name === currentCategory
                    ? 'bg-purple-600 text-purple-25 hover:bg-purple-500'
                    : 'bg-white text-purple-700 shadow-sm hover:bg-purple-100',
                ]}
                href={`/gallery/${category.slug}#gallery`}
              >
                {category.name}
              </a>
            </li>
          ))
        }
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>

  {/* Background for overlay effect */}
  <div class="h-56 w-full bg-purple-25"></div>

  {/* Gallery */}
  <div
    class="-mb-48 mt-12 -translate-y-56 px-4 sm:mt-16 sm:px-6 lg:mt-20 lg:px-8"
  >
    <div class="mx-auto max-w-3xl lg:max-w-screen-xl">
      <ul
        id="gallery-grid"
        class="grid gap-y-8 sm:grid-cols-2 sm:gap-6 lg:grid-cols-4 lg:gap-4 2xl:gap-5"
      >
        {
          galleryEntries.map((galleryEntry) => (
            <li
              class="group relative cursor-pointer"
              data-src={galleryEntry.data.image.src.src}
            >
              <div class="aspect-h-1 aspect-w-1 bg-purple-50">
                <Image
                  src={galleryEntry.data.image.src}
                  class="rounded-2xl object-cover"
                  alt={galleryEntry.data.image.alt}
                />
                <div class="absolute inset-0 rounded-2xl bg-gray-900 opacity-0 transition duration-300 group-hover:opacity-60" />
                <div class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center justify-center opacity-0 transition duration-300 group-hover:opacity-100">
                  <div class="flex h-24 w-24 items-center justify-center rounded-full bg-purple-600 opacity-80">
                    <Icon name="tabler:plus" class="h-12 w-12 text-white" />
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </li>
          ))
        }
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

            x-data

          ></span>
        </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

import { Image } from 'astro:assets'
import { Icon } from 'astro-icon/components'
import questionMark from '@images/illustrations/question-mark.svg'
import bulb from '@images/illustrations/bulb.svg'
import { getCollection } from 'astro:content'

const faqs = await getCollection('faqs')
const renderedFaqs = await Promise.all(
  faqs.map(async (faq) => ({
    ...faq,
    rendered: await faq.render()
  }))
)
---

<section class="bg-gray-900 py-24">
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-7xl px-6 lg:px-8">
    <div class="mx-auto max-w-4xl text-center">
      <h2 class="text-3xl font-bold tracking-tight text-white sm:text-4xl">
        <span x-data x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '자주 묻는 질문' : 'Frequently Asked Questions'"></span>
      </h2>
      <p class="mt-4 text-lg leading-8 text-gray-300">
        <span x-data x-text="$store.language === 'ko' 
          ? 'BagelEdu 서비스에 대해 궁금하신 점을 확인해보세요' 
          : 'Check out common questions about BagelEdu services'">
        </span>
      </p>
    </div>

    <div class="mx-auto mt-16 max-w-3xl">
      <div class="space-y-4">
        {
          renderedFaqs.map((faq, index) => (
            <div class="bg-white rounded-xl overflow-hidden shadow-sm">
              <button
                type="button"
                class="flex w-full items-start justify-between text-left px-6 py-4"
                aria-controls={`faq-${index}`}
                data-faq-button
              >
                <span class="text-base font-semibold leading-7 text-gray-900" x-data={`{ question: ${JSON.stringify(faq.data.question)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? question.ko : question.en">
                </span>
                <span class="ml-6 flex h-7 items-center">
                  <svg class="h-6 w-6 rotate-0 transform duration-200 text-gray-400" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke-width="1.5" stroke="currentColor" aria-hidden="true">
                    <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" d="M19.5 8.25l-7.5 7.5-7.5-7.5" />
                  </svg>
                </span>
              </button>
              <div class="hidden px-6 pb-4" id={`faq-${index}`} data-faq-answer>
                <div class="text-base leading-7 text-gray-600">
                  <div x-data={`{ answer: ${JSON.stringify(faq.data.answer)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? answer.ko : answer.en">
                  </div>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          ))
        }
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<script>
  const faqButtons = document.querySelectorAll('[data-faq-button]');
  const faqAnswers = document.querySelectorAll('[data-faq-answer]');

  faqButtons.forEach((button, index) => {
    button.addEventListener('click', () => {
      const answer = document.getElementById(`faq-${index}`);
      const icon = button.querySelector('svg');
      
      // Toggle current answer
      answer?.classList.toggle('hidden');
      icon?.classList.toggle('rotate-180');
      
      // Close other answers
      faqAnswers.forEach((otherAnswer, otherIndex) => {
        if (otherIndex !== index) {
          otherAnswer.classList.add('hidden');
          const otherIcon = faqButtons[otherIndex].querySelector('svg');
          otherIcon?.classList.remove('rotate-180');
        }
      });
    });
  });
</script>

  'programs',
  (program) => program.data.featured
)

<section
  class="overflow-hidden px-4 pb-24 pt-16 sm:px-6 sm:pb-28 sm:pt-24 md:pb-0 lg:px-8"
>
  {/* Container */}
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-xl md:max-w-screen-xl">
    {/* Section header title and subtext  */}
    <div>
      <div class="w-100 text-center flex justify-center items-center flex-col">
        <h2 class="h2 max-w-4xl text-purple-900">
          BagelEdu Service
        </h2>
        <h3 class="h3 text-purple mt-2">Tutor - Offline/Online</h3>
      </div>
    </div>
    {/* School programs */}
    <div class="mt-16 md:mt-52 md:grid md:grid-cols-2 md:gap-8 lg:gap-16">
      {
        featuredPrograms.map((program, index) => (
          <div
            class:list={[
              'relative',
              {
                'mt-12 w-full rounded-3xl bg-yellow-200 px-8 py-10 sm:p-12 md:mt-0 md:px-8 md:py-10 lg:p-12':
                  index == 1 || index == 3,
                'mt-12 w-full rounded-3xl bg-blue-50 px-8 py-10 sm:p-12 md:mt-0 md:px-8 md:py-10 lg:p-12':
                  index == 2,
              },
            ]}
          >
            {index == 0 && (
              <Image
                src={curvedDottedLine}
                class="absolute left-1/2 top-0 hidden -translate-y-1/2 md:block"
                style={{ width: 'calc(50% + 4rem)', maxHeight: '900px' }}
                alt=""
              />
            )}
            <div
              class:list={[
                {
                  'relative z-10 w-full rounded-3xl bg-purple-25 px-8 py-10 sm:p-12 md:px-8 md:py-10 lg:p-12':
                    index == 0,
                },
              ]}
            >
              <div
                class="flex flex-col justify-between"
                transition:name={program.slug}
                style={{ minHeight: '602px' }}
              >
                <div class="flex-1">
                  <h3 class="h3 text-purple-900">{program.data.name}</h3>
                  <p class="mt-3 max-w-2xl text-lg leading-loose text-purple-800">
                    {program.data.hero.text}
                  </p>
                  <div class="aspect-h-2 aspect-w-3 relative mt-8">
                    <Image
                      class="absolute inset-0 rounded-2xl object-contain"
                      src={program.data.hero.image.src}
                      alt={program.data.hero.image.alt}
                    />
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="mt-8">
                  <Button
                    href={`/programs/${program.slug}`}
                    variant="accent"
                    size="sm"
                  >
                    Learn more
                    <Icon
                      name="tabler:arrow-narrow-right"
                      class="ml-3 h-5 w-5 group-hover:animate-horizontal-bounce"
                    />
                  </Button>
                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
            {index == 0 && (
              <Image
                src={loopedDottedLine}
                class="absolute bottom-0 left-1/2 hidden translate-y-[90%] md:block"
                style={{ width: 'calc(50% + 4rem)' }}
                alt=""
              />
            )}
          </div>
        ))
      }
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

<div class="relative isolate overflow-hidden bg-white">
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-7xl px-4 pt-24 sm:px-6 sm:pt-32 lg:pt-40">
    <div class="lg:flex lg:items-center lg:gap-x-10">

      <div class="mx-auto max-w-2xl lg:mx-0 lg:flex-auto">
        <h1

        >
          <span
            x-data
            x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '아이비리그 출신의 멘토와 함께 하는 밀착형 대학 입시 컨설팅 및 영어 수업!!' : 'Exclusive College Consulting and Education with Ivy League Mentors'"
          ></span>
        </h1>

        <div class="mt-6 sm:mt-10">
          <a
            href="/contact"
            class="inline-block w-auto rounded-full bg-gradient-to-r from-purple-600 to-purple-500 px-6 py-2.5 text-base font-medium text-white shadow-lg transition-all hover:from-purple-500 hover:to-purple-400"
            x-data
            x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? '상담 예약하기' : 'Book a Consultation'"
          ></a>
        </div>

        <!-- Stats Grid -->
        <div
          class="mt-10 grid grid-cols-2 gap-x-8 gap-y-6 sm:mt-16 sm:grid-cols-4"
        >
          {
            stats.map((stat) => (
              <div class="flex flex-col">
                <dt
                  class="text-sm font-semibold leading-6 text-purple-600 sm:text-base"
                  x-data={`{ stat: ${JSON.stringify(stat)} }`}
                  x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? stat.name.ko : stat.name.en"
                />
                <dd class="mt-2 text-2xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900 sm:text-3xl">
                  {stat.value}
                </dd>
              </div>
            ))
          }
        </div>
      </div>

      <!-- Image -->
      <div class="mt-16 sm:mt-24 lg:mt-0 lg:flex-shrink-0">
        <Image
          src={portraitImage}
          alt="BagelEdu Tutor"
          width={800}
          height={1000}
          class="mx-auto w-full max-w-[18rem] sm:max-w-[24rem] md:max-w-[30rem] lg:max-w-[36rem]"
        />
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <!-- Background Effect -->
  <div
    class="absolute inset-x-0 -top-40 -z-10 transform-gpu overflow-hidden blur-3xl sm:-top-80"
  >
    <div
      class="relative left-[calc(50%-11rem)] aspect-[1155/678] w-[36.125rem] -translate-x-1/2 rotate-[30deg] bg-gradient-to-tr from-purple-600 to-purple-500 opacity-20 sm:left-[calc(50%-30rem)] sm:w-[72.1875rem]"
      style="clip-path: polygon(74.1% 44.1%, 100% 61.6%, 97.5% 26.9%, 85.5% 0.1%, 80.7% 2%, 72.5% 32.5%, 60.2% 62.4%, 52.4% 68.1%, 47.5% 58.3%, 45.2% 34.5%, 27.5% 76.7%, 0.1% 64.9%, 17.9% 100%, 27.6% 76.8%, 76.1% 97.7%, 74.1% 44.1%)"
    >
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script is:inline>
  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => {
    const bookingButton = document.getElementById('bookingButton')
    const bookingContainer = document.getElementById('bookingContainer')
    const closeButton = document.getElementById('closeButton')

    if (bookingButton && bookingContainer && closeButton) {
      bookingButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        bookingContainer.classList.remove('hidden')
        document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden'
      })

      closeButton.addEventListener('click', () => {
        bookingContainer.classList.add('hidden')
        document.body.style.overflow = ''
      })

      bookingContainer.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
        if (e.target === bookingContainer) {
          bookingContainer.classList.add('hidden')
          document.body.style.overflow = ''
        }
      })
    }
  })
</script>

  {/* Container */}
  <div class="mx-auto max-w-2xl lg:max-w-screen-xl">
    {/* Section header title and subtext  */}
    <div>
      <h2 class="h2 text-purple-900 lg:text-center">Upcoming events</h2>
      <p
        class="mx-auto mt-3 max-w-2xl text-xl leading-relaxed text-purple-800 lg:mt-4 lg:text-center"
      >
        Vestibulum ac diam sit amet quam vehicula elementum sed sit amet dui.
        Curabitur arcu erat, accumsan id imperdiet et, porttitor at sem.
      </p>
    </div>
    {/* Events */}

              eventColors[index % 4],

            {/* Event image */}

              class:list={[

                src={event.data.image.src}
                class:list={[
                  'absolute inset-0 h-full w-full rounded-t-2xl object-cover object-center',
                  index % 2 == 0
                    ? 'sm:rounded-l-2xl sm:rounded-tr-none'
                    : 'sm:rounded-r-2xl sm:rounded-tl-none',
                ]}
                alt={event.data.image.alt}
              />
            </div>
            {/* Event info */}

              class:list={[
                'flex h-full flex-col justify-center px-6 py-8 sm:col-span-8 sm:px-8 sm:py-10 lg:px-6 xl:px-8',
                { 'order-2 sm:order-1': index % 2 == 1 },
              ]}
            >
              <div>
                <div class="inline-flex -rotate-1 items-center justify-center rounded-xl bg-purple-200 px-3.5 py-0.5 align-top text-sm font-medium leading-6 text-purple-700">
                  {event.data.dates}
                </div>
              </div>
              <h4 class="mt-4 text-2xl font-bold text-purple-900 sm:text-3xl lg:text-2xl lg:leading-tight xl:text-3xl xl:leading-tight">

                {event.data.description}
              </p>
            </div>
          </div>
        ))

  </div>
</section>

import { Image } from 'astro:assets'
import { Icon } from 'astro-icon/components'
import Button from '@components/shared/Button.astro'
import dotsGrid from '@images/illustrations/dots-large-grid.svg'
import arrow from '@images/illustrations/arrow-right-over.svg'

const linkColors = [
  'bg-purple-50',
  'bg-yellow-200',
  'bg-rose-50',
  'bg-teal-50',
  'bg-blue-50',
]

const links = [
  {
    label: 'Community',
    href: '#0',
    description: 'Join the parent-teacher group chat',
    icon: 'messages',

File: src/components/programs/ProgramHero.astro

---
import { Image } from 'astro:assets'
import type { Program } from '@types'

interface Props {
  program: Program
}

const { program } = Astro.props
const { hero } = program.data
---

<section class="relative overflow-hidden bg-white">
  <div class="max-w-7xl mx-auto px-4 sm:px-6 lg:px-8 py-16 sm:py-24">
    <div class="text-center">
      <h1 class="text-4xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900 sm:text-5xl md:text-6xl">
        <span class="block xl:inline">{hero.headline}</span>
      </h1>
      <p class="mx-auto mt-3 max-w-md text-base text-gray-500 sm:text-lg md:mt-5 md:max-w-3xl md:text-xl">
        {hero.text}
      </p>
      <div class="mx-auto mt-5 max-w-md sm:flex sm:justify-center md:mt-8">
        <div class="rounded-md shadow">
          <a
            href={hero.action.href}
            class="flex w-full items-center justify-center rounded-md border border-transparent bg-purple-600 px-8 py-3 text-base font-medium text-white hover:bg-purple-700 md:py-4 md:px-10 md:text-lg"
          >
            {hero.action.icon && (
              <span class="mr-2">
                <svg class="h-6 w-6" fill="none" viewBox="0 0 24 24" stroke="currentColor">
                  <path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d={hero.action.icon.toString()} />
                </svg>
              </span>
            )}
            {hero.action.label}
          </a>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="relative mt-16">
      <div class="absolute inset-0 flex items-center" aria-hidden="true">
        <div class="w-full border-t border-gray-300"></div>
      </div>
      <div class="relative flex justify-center">
        <div class="inline-flex items-center rounded-full border border-gray-300 bg-white px-4 py-1.5 text-sm font-medium leading-5 text-gray-500">
          <span>Learn more about our program</span>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
    <div class="relative mt-8">
      <div class="aspect-w-16 aspect-h-9 overflow-hidden rounded-lg shadow-lg">
        <Image 
          src={hero.image.src} 
          alt="Program hero" 
          class="object-cover"
          width={hero.image.src.width}
          height={hero.image.src.height}
        />
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

File: src/components/programs/ProgramInfoCard.astro

import { Icon } from 'astro-icon/components'

interface Props {
  icon: string
  title: {
    ko: string
    en: string
  }
  description?: {
    ko: string
    en: string
  }
  gradientColors?: {
    bgColor: string
    iconBgColor: string
    startColor: string
    endColor: string
  }
}

const {
  icon,
  title,
  description,
  gradientColors = {
    bgColor: '#F5F5F7',
    iconBgColor: '#4F46E5',
    startColor: '#4F46E5',
    endColor: '#9333EA',
  },
} = Astro.props
---

<div
  class:list={[
    'group relative overflow-hidden rounded-3xl px-6 py-8 transition-all duration-500 ease-in-out hover:shadow-2xl bg-white border border-gray-100',
  ]}
  x-data="{ expanded: false }"
  @mouseenter="expanded = true"
  @mouseleave="expanded = false"
>
  {/* Background gradient effect */}
  <div class="absolute inset-0 bg-gradient-to-br from-gray-50 to-transparent opacity-0 transition-all duration-500 ease-in-out group-hover:opacity-100"></div>
  
  <div class="relative flex w-full flex-col items-center">
    <div class="transform rounded-2xl p-4 shadow-lg transition-all duration-500 ease-out group-hover:scale-110 group-hover:shadow-xl bg-gray-50">
      <Icon name={icon} class="h-8 w-8 text-gray-900 transition-all duration-500 ease-out group-hover:rotate-12" />
    </div>

    <h4 class="mt-6 text-center text-2xl font-bold tracking-tight text-gray-900">
      <span x-data={`{ title: ${JSON.stringify(title)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? title.en : title.en"></span>
    </h4>

    <div class="relative mt-4 h-0.5 w-16 overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-gray-100">
      <div class="absolute inset-0 translate-x-[-100%] bg-gradient-to-r from-gray-900 to-gray-700 transition-transform duration-700 ease-out group-hover:translate-x-0">
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

  <div 
    class="relative mt-6 text-center text-lg text-gray-800 transition-all duration-700 ease-in-out"
    :class="expanded ? 'max-h-[500px]' : 'max-h-[4.5rem] overflow-hidden'"
  >
    {description && (
      <p class="transition-all duration-500">
        <span x-data={`{ description: ${JSON.stringify(description)} }`} x-text="$store.language === 'ko' ? description.ko : description.en"></span>
      </p>
    )}

    <!-- Fade gradient at the bottom when not expanded -->
    <div 
      class="absolute bottom-0 left-0 right-0 h-12 bg-gradient-to-t from-white to-transparent transition-all duration-500 ease-in-out pointer-events-none"
      :class="expanded ? 'opacity-0 translate-y-2' : 'opacity-100 translate-y-0'"
    >
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<style>
  /* Ensure each card's Alpine.js state is isolated */
  div[x-data] {
    isolation: isolate;
  }

  .max-h-\[4\.5rem\] {
    max-height: 4.5rem;
  }
  .max-h-\[500px\] {
    max-height: 500px;
  }

  /* Add custom cubic-bezier easing */
  .transition-all {
    transition-timing-function: cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1);
  }
</style>
